page.title: 15CHILDREN'S GAMES IN HORNSEA
page.content:
We asked approximately 170 children in the 7 to 11 age range at Hornsea Primary School what their favourite game was. We divided their answers into 5 categories. They were:-
a) Sports Games b) Tig c) Blocky (a form of Hide and Seek) d) Hide and Seek e) Bike Riding
All forms of sports games such as football, cricket and rounders were popular with the older children but the traditional games were only played regularly by the younger children.It was not expected that riding bicycles would be such a popular activity and another category had to be made to include this. PETER HARNESS 5.G.
